name: rbb-permissionamento
description: Smart contracts de permissionamento da RBB

scripts.ignition-mock: npx hardhat ignition deploy ignition/modules/AdminMockModule.js --network local
scripts.ignition-local: npx hardhat ignition deploy ignition/modules/PermissionamentoModule.js --parameters ignition/parameters-local.json --network local
scripts.ignition-local-besu: npx hardhat ignition deploy ignition/modules/PermissionamentoModule.js --parameters ignition/parameters-local.json --network local_besu

author: RBB
